org.directwebremoting.convert
Class BaseV20Converter

java.lang.Object
  org.directwebremoting.convert.BaseV20Converter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayConverter, BasicObjectConverter, BigNumberConverter, CharArrayConverter, CollectionConverter, ConstructorConverter, DateConverter, DOM4JConverter, DOMConverter, EnumConverter, JDOMConverter, PrimitiveConverter, ServletConverter, StringConverter, URLConverter, XOMConverter
public abstract class BaseV20Converter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter

A way to migrate from the DWRv2.0 Converter style to something in the future. Inheriting from this is advised to help with forwards compatibility.

Author:
Joe Walker [joe at getahead dot ltd dot uk]

          If we are a compound converter that farms out part of the conversion to other converters then you farm the conversion out via a configuration.
